entry.comment:
Changelog v. 2.0 Release Candidate 2.0
Added Releasetime Added Licenses Added System LookAndFeel Added CLI - however, not finished! You can use core-addupload and core-startqueue Added possibility of direct logfile commitment.
Improved Browserinteractions Improved exception catching Improved code style Restructured Uploader - now more responsive.
Fixed Queue-Stop bug Fixed some minor bugs
v. 2.0 Release Candidate 1
Added Monetarisierungsfunktion Added Contentowner Abfrage Added DebugMode? (Strg+Shift+D) Added Datenbankverschlüsselung Added Language English
Improved Codestructure Improved Facebookzugang (SocializePlugin?) Improved Ordnerüberwachung Improved Uploadvorgang Improved Computershutdown - Parameter -f erzwingt nun den Shutdown, falls eine Anwendung blockt. Improved Datenbankverbindung Improved Sprachhandling
Fixed Titel, Beschreibungs und Taglänge. Fixed Some Minor Bugs
v. 2.0 beta 300
Added Hyperlink zum fertiggestellten Video Added Neue Bilder für Socialize Aktiviäten Added SocializePlugin? (Twitter, Facebook)
Improved overall GUI Improved Look And Feel Improved QueueTable?
Removed Import alter Dateien Fixed TagValidator? - Zählproblem Fixed several minor bugs
v. 2.0 beta 200
Published PluginAPI - have fun developing your plugins :) Added PluginManager? - funktionslos Added DirectoryObserverPlugin? => Ordnerüberwachung Added Presets speichern nun Accounts + Playlists Added NotificationsPlugin? => Benachrichtigungen wie aus 1.3.X
Improved FileChooser? => Benutzt nun vorheriges Verzeichnis Improved Export / Import => UTF-8 verified Improved Chunk-Size => Chunk-Size nun anpassbar Adjusted Splash-Screen-Size
Fixed several minor bugs Fixed Issue 40 Fixed Issue 42
v. 2.0 alpha 104
Added Einstellungen Added Designeinstellung
Improved memory usage Improved Anwendugnslayout Improved Anwendungsgröße
Fixed Issue 37 Fixed Issue 38

Fixed Issue 37 Fixed Issue 38
